sub_title: SAP Master Data Governance Expert- Business Partner
summary: Detail-oriented, efficient and organized with 5 years experience in SAP Master Data. Has been assigned to Singapore, Malaysia and China on Customer Master Data Maintenance Process and support and Data Migration with 2 full implementation.   Has Leaded the Data Migration with three full implementation of Price in SD Module.  Has relevant experience as Route Settlement Analyst and Sales Accounting and Inventory Analyst in a manufacturing industry.  Possess strong analytical skills, resourceful in the completion of projects, effective at multi-tasking and enthusiastic to learn.

company.name: Business System Implementation(BSI) - Amway Business Services  Asia Pacific Sdn. Bhd.

profile_positions.company: Business System Implementation(BSI) - Amway Business Services  Asia Pacific Sdn. Bhd.
profile_positions.description:
•	Lead, plan communication with AsiaPac Data Stewards, BSI members, IT organization and managers and above to speed the project progress.
•	Lead and adopt the Data Quality Life Cycle (DQLC) that support a robust data quality program. 
•	Collaborate with IT organization and business data stewards to identify critical data elements that are critical to the strategic projects and develop data rules that define the quality of each data element.
•	Analyse & resolve data quality problem using the Informatica data quality tool to create data scorecards and profiles that illuminate these data quality
•	Determine actions/steps towards data cleansing activities or process improvement solutions within the AsiaPac region
•	Review and identify change impact on daily operations process and derive measures to support implementation with consultation of the Change Management team
•	Define, monitor and drives ongoing data quality measurement and metrics by regular data scorecards execution for AsiaPac
•	Develop team members to be able to train the AsiaPac data stewards and ensure they perform their responsible duties.
	Approve definitions and data model to each logical data element
	Review and validate data scorecards for each logical data element
	Perform root cause analysis for data quality issues and propose necessary changes to processes or technology
	Enforce compliance of the Enterprise Standard of each logical data element
	Continuous data monitoring and correction of sufficient data quality
	Communicate adoption strategy within business organization
profile_positions.title: Lead Business Analyst-Data Management

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead Master Data Migration on Vendor, Article, Site, Finance and other related master data
•	Consolidate and Collects Data for migration in SAP ECC 6
•	Map fields from legacy system to new system
•	Cleanse, validate and provide quality data before uploading to new system 
•	Review and propose new processes for Data Maintenance
profile_positions.title: SAP Specialist

company.name: Coca Cola Bottlers Business Services Inc.

profile_positions.description:
• Partnered with respective manager and team lead to estimate effort and implement various client requests within those estimates (Data Maintenance, Data Loading and Business Process). 
• Conduct final check (e.g., check methodology, reasonableness, propriety of information) of data prior to distribution
• Responsible for day-to-day global and local data maintenance requests from Coke One Member Bottlers. Execution should be within set KPI’s and SLA’s.
• Learn existing applications and design new tools for Portal creation to improve processes.
• Has relevant exposure to Trade Promotion Management, Material Master, Customer Master, Vendor Master and Finance Master.
• Review all master data maintenance in Price, Customer, Vendor, Material and Finance master.

Projects:
Cambodia Beverage Company, Ltd.
Phom Phen, Cambodia
Customer and Price Master Data Governance (Business Process and Data Governance)
July 19 – Aug. 09, 2013 - on site
• Provide Work Standard Documentation on Customer and Price Process
• Review and proposed new processes to business in Customer Master Data Maintenance and Price

SHANGHAI SHEN - MEI BEVERAGE AND FOOD Co., Ltd.
Shanghai, China
Shenmei Project (Data Migration/Conversion)
August, 2012 - April, 2013 – off site (Philippines)
February 2013 – April, 2013 – onsite (Shanghai, China)

• Partnered with respective Project Manager to estimate effort and implement various client requests within those estimates (Data Loading in Customer Master, Material Master and Pricing Condition). 
• Conduct final check (e.g., check methodology, reasonableness, propriety of information) of data prior to distribution
• Analyze data conversion requests and utilize existing tools to prepare deliverable; assist in preparation and coordination of that deliverable.
• Uses LSMW and Load Programs as a load tools in Data Migration.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Master Data Senior Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Project Assignment:

• Lead, Business Process in Customer Master Data Maintenance
